description.value: At 1st level, you gain @Compendium[pf1.spells.uqh87jz757r2cb7r]{Detect Magic} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.j0bc0iii8zp1jiwr]{Read Magic} as spells known. At 5th level, the phoenixâ€™s blood drives you to find and save lost knowledge and magical items. As a swift action, you can automatically identify the properties of a non-cursed magic item you hold; you must still identify a cursed item as normal to correctly identify it as cursed. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier per day.
